color_rules.description: Choose colors based on skin undertone.
color_rules.neutral_undertones: Can wear both warm and cool palettes.

fabric_texture_rules.guidance: Invest in high-quality natural fibers for longevity and elegance.

accessorizing_rules.guidance: Hat should complement face shape and outfit. Wide-brimmed for drama with summer dress, cloche hat with tailored suit.
Glove length should be in proportion to sleeve length: longer gloves with shorter sleeves, shorter gloves with longer sleeves.
Use belts to define waist and add structure. Have various widths/textures. Narrow bright belts for accent, wide cinched belts for drama.
Choose 1-2 standout items, keep rest simple. Avoid over-accessorizing.

fit_checklist: Does the garment fit perfectly without pulling or gaping?
Is it tailored to enhance your natural silhouette?
Does it allow for comfortable movement?
Is the length and proportion flattering for your body?
quality_checklist: Is the fabric high-quality (e.g., natural fibers like silk, wool, cotton, cashmere)?
Is the construction sturdy with neat seams and finishes?
Does the garment maintain its shape and structure?
Will it age well and last over time?
personal_alignment_checklist: Does the garment reflect your personality and style?
Does it make you feel confident and at ease?
Is it versatile enough for multiple occasions?
Does it enhance your natural beauty without overshadowing you?

core_principles: Choose timeless pieces over fleeting trends.
Use accessories to personalize and elevate outfits.
Dress appropriately for the occasion while maintaining individuality.
Maintain grooming as a foundation of elegance.
